attributes.action: Ban MPs from having paid or unpaid second jobs / company roles
attributes.additional_details: MPs should concentrate solely on public and national interest(s). In my opinion, there is not a solid argument (except for personal gain/wealth) for an MP to have a second job that does not conflict with their parliamentary role or distract them from what should be a full time role.
attributes.background:
To make a law to ban MPs from having second jobs or company roles (paid or unpaid).

This should be discussed in parliament and brought into law to ban second jobs (paid or unpaid in any asset).

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban MPs from having second jobs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600866

Ban MPs from other paid work or holding shares in companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600571
